title: Control Flow
description: Learn if-else, loops, and control structures

problems.title: Odd or Even
problems.description: Check if a number is odd or even.
problems.starter_code:
num = int(input())
# Complete the odd/even check

problems.title: FizzBuzz
problems.description: Print numbers from 1 to N with FizzBuzz rules.

hidden_test_cases.expected_output:
1
2
Fizz
4
Buzz
Fizz
7
8
Fizz
Buzz
11
Fizz
13
14
FizzBuzz

problems.title: Prime Numbers
problems.description: Write a program to print all prime numbers up to N.
problems.starter_code:
n = int(input())
# Implement prime number generator
